title: how well would this PC  run games like league of legends, WoW, diablo 3 etc?
body:
i want to be able to play these games on decent settings while streaming. here are my specs again lol:

Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4790K Processor (4x 4.0GHz/8MB L3 Cache) - Intel® Core™ i7-4790K (10% overclocked)
Memory:  8 GB [4 GB x2] DDR3-1600 Memory Module - Corsair Vengeance
Graphics Card:  NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 - 4GB - EVGA Superclocked - Single Card
Power supply: 700 Watt - Standard - *Free Upgrade to 800W Standard

thanks guys
